title: Tidy Tuesday Contributions
description: Contributions for "R" Tidy Tuesday Weekly Project
contents:
Tidy Tuesday is a weekly R project where people contribute weekly to showcase their R skills
Github Repo for Tidy Tuesday: Tidy-Tuesday Link
My Tidy Tuesday Contributions:
Olympics Shiny App: Week31- 2021-07-27
App Description & Link: Olympics_App
Output table where athletes details are displayed based on Country,Sport & Year,
Plot displays the medals won by a particular country,sport and year. Medal count is counted for all sports(team sports included as well).

title: College Magazine Articles
description: Articles which got published in Official College Magazine
contents:
As a data science graduate and a sports enthusiast,I always wanted to analyze sports with respect to data and statistics.I got an opportunity to write articles which got published in my college official magazine.(Infobahn)
1.Impact of AI in Wimbledon Tennis Championships
This article focuses imapact of Artificial Intelligence(AI) in the game of tennis.
The article link - link
2.Importance of Longest Format(Test Cricket)
I love watching test cricket because it’s one of the hardest and the best form of the game.This article is mainly focused on test cricket greats and their statistics and importance of 5-day format. Link to the article - link

title: Sports Analytics
contents:
As a sports enthusiast,I always explore data and stats with respect to all sports.There are a lot of resources for sports analytics which tells us the beauty of sports and data.
Sports has always been part of my life.
Resources for Sports Analytics:
All major resources in this blog is covered.If I miss out I will be updating it later.
Football:
Fbref-One of the top football statistics site in which event data can be downloaded across all the famous leagues. https://fbref.com/en/
UnderStat- https://understat.com/
Transfer Markt- https://www.transfermarkt.co.in/
PySport- All of us use different programming languages for our analysis. PySport is a wonderful site in which we can find lot of packages,data,tutorials,documentation for implementing sport analytics.
https://pysport.org/
They also have a great community and also on discord.The link to the discord link
StatsBomb-One of the top sites for football blogs.Analysis is great and they also provide free data.There is a statsBomb conference on 17th March 2021 which is a free online event.Do not miss that.
Other football blog sites-
https://www.fourfourtwo.com/
https://fivethirtyeight.com/sports/

Tutorials-
https://fcpython.com/
http://fcrstats.com/
Friends of Tracking Youtube-link
Tableau for Sports-link

Conferences-
https://statsbomb.com/conference/
Opta Sport Conference-link

Basketball:
There is another sport in which lot of analytics is being done and no surprise.Its Basketball.
Recently,NBA Team Utah Jazz used Python Dash in players draft for the season 2020-21 article
Resources for BasketBall-
https://www.basketball-reference.com/
https://www.positiveresidual.com/
https://in.nba.com/?gr=www
https://github.com/josedv82/shinyAMS-resources For R Shiny
Tennis:
http://tennisabstract.com/
Cricket:
https://cricsheet.org/downloads/
https://wisden.com/
There is a lot more to come .I’ll keep this blog post updated.If you are interested in sports analytics and wanted to work along with me ping me on Twitter link
